channel.title: Blogs on Lets Try
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Lets Try

item.title: Creating a Blog
item.description: Learning Machine Why This I started looking into Jeykll to document my journey dealing with technologies while I am learning those. I also plan on creating a knowledgebase site !(https://goforaditya.github.io/know) as repo for taking short notes of everything I learn (maybe a custom gitchekout and store the MD files seperately for better vis.). But then I stumbled on Hugo and looking at how simple it is to step and the colourful themes (mostly themes) I settled for hugo.
